sections.title: Who We Are
sections.description: We are Catholics rooted in Jesus Christ, nourished by the grace of the sacraments, and live as the body of Christ, spreading the message of the Gospel of Jesus Christ to those around us.

sections.title: Who Can be Members of ILCC
sections.description: All Latin Catholics of India can be members of ILCC. We also extend our welcome to anyone who is baptized Catholic or would like to explore the Catholic faith. While we are rooted in our identity as an ethnic Indian community, we deeply value and cherish the presence of everyone who chooses to join us.

subSections.title: Mission
subSections.description: The spiritual growth of each member, as envisioned by the Catholic Church, along with fraternal care and concern for the members of the community in need.

subSections.title: Vision
subSections.description: Every member of ILCC will grow in Gospel values, leading a life of missionary discipleship while cherishing their cultural heritage.

subSections.title: Values
list: Praying together for the good of all
